analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika sa hetuka duka

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sahetuko
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ sa hetukaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anidassana sappaṭigham na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: anidassanaappaṭigho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighaḥ sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭigha

original: nasahetukañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa hetukam ca na anidassana sappaṭigham na sa hetukam ca dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭigham na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta
na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na ahetukam ca na a nidassana sa paṭigham na ahetukam ca dhamma

original: paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca anidassana sappaṭighaḥ ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa
